strings.Value: "Kassil Aldori is a bad choice — a boring, spineless idealist. How will he defend the interests of the {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}, if he can't even stand on his own?"
"He's certainly lacking in artifice and wit — much needed qualities in a diplomat."
"What kind of advice is that? Hire a dishonest servant, to better deceive one's neighbors?"
"He's not lacking in valor and honor, the most important qualities for any person."
